    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <entry>cahi1:data_111488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Azo dye formation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Azo Färbung Anordnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de colorant azoïque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação da tintura azo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione della tintura azo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αζωτούχος σχηματισμός χρωστικών ουσιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del tinte azo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the formation of a chromophore-containing bright red azo dye when a diazonium salt is combined with napthalene-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">azo dye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chromophore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diazonium salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">napthalene-2-ol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organic molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung einer 
Chromophor-enthaltenen hellen roten azo Färbung, wenn ein 
Diazoniumsalz mit napthalene-2-ol kombiniert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre la formation d'un 
colorant azoïque rouge lumineux chromophore-contenant quand un sel de
diazonium est combiné avec napthalene-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra a formação de uma 
tintura azo vermelha brilhante chromophore-contendo quando um sal do 
diazonium é combinado com o napthalene-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra la formazione di 
una tintura azo rossa luminosa cromoforo-contenente quando un sale del
diazonio è unito con napthalene-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει το σχηματισμό μιας 
θχρομοπχορε-περιέχοντας φωτεινής κόκκινης αζωτούχας χρωστικής 
ουσίας όταν συνδυάζεται ένα diazonium άλας με ναπτχαλενε-2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra la formación de un 
tinte azo rojo brillante chromophore-que contiene cuando una sal del 
diazonium se combina con napthalene-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
